titleStmt.title: Noua orbis terrarum descriptio opti[c]e proiecta secundu[m]q[ue] peritissimos Anglie geographos multis ni [sic] locis castigatissima et preceteris ipsiq[ue] globo nauigationi faciliter applcanda [sic] per Ioannem Blagrauum gen[er]osum Readingensem mathesibus beneuolentem Beniamin Wright Anglus Londinensis cælator anno Domini 1596
titleStmt.author: Blagrave, John, d. 1611.

titleStmt.title: Noua orbis terrarum descriptio opti[c]e proiecta secundu[m]q[ue] peritissimos Anglie geographos multis ni [sic] locis castigatissima et preceteris ipsiq[ue] globo nauigationi faciliter applcanda [sic] per Ioannem Blagrauum gen[er]osum Readingensem mathesibus beneuolentem Beniamin Wright Anglus Londinensis cælator anno Domini 1596
titleStmt.author: Blagrave, John, d. 1611.
Wright, Benjamin, engraver.
Blagrave, John, d. 1611. Astrolabium uranicum generale.

notesStmt.note: Two engraved maps, the first terrestrial, the second celestial ("Astrolabium uranicum generale .."). Evidently intended to illustrate Blagrave's book "Astrolabium uranicum generale", but are not found in any copy of the latter.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
